scripts.ci:publish: bun run ci:resolve-workspaces && node scripts/publish-changed.mjs && changeset tag
scripts.ci:publish:beta: bun run ci:resolve-workspaces && node scripts/publish-changed.mjs beta && changeset tag
scripts.ci:publish:alpha: bun run ci:resolve-workspaces && node scripts/publish-changed.mjs alpha
scripts.ci:release: bun run ci:version && bun run ci:publish
scripts.ci:release:beta: bun run ci:version && bun run ci:publish:beta
scripts.ci:release:alpha: bun run ci:version && bun run ci:publish:alpha
